name: A Fine Line
description:
Love is an adventure!

In this small, but challenging adventure you will have to traverse a dangerous world filled with obstacles. Use your environment to get passed all the obstacles that block your path, so that you can finally get to that special person.

Controls

Controller: Move with left joystick. Jump with the A button.
Keyboard: Move with AD or the arrow keys. Jump with Space or Left Ctrl.

This game was part of a 48h gamejam called, the Lovejam.
